Welcome I am Jerinas Gresch BI Analyst & Software Developer

About Me Projects

My Expertise

During my studies I worked for 3 years in a large company in the field of Business Intelligence. In my master's degree I focused on the topics Machine Learning and Blockchain, which I applied in my final theses. Furthermore, in cooperation with a start-up company, an Android app was developed. It was connected to a Rasberry Pi via Bluetooth, which was attached to motion sensors at the same time to classify the wearer's movement using machine learning. The use case was a sports app that could monitor whether you were doing exercises correctly.

BI

Microsoft Technology Stack for BI applying the ETL approach using SSIS, SSRS and MSSQL in order to visualize data with PowerBi.

Projects

Blockchain-based certificate verification

  • Smart Contracts
  • React.js
  • Geth

To counter diploma fraud, Blockchain can be used to verify the authenticity by storing the hash of a unique certificate.

Check it out

Temporal Operators on Partitioned Relations

  • C

This project addresses the problem of inefficient temporal operations because of overlapping tuples in each relation. Therefore, the relations are split into partitions, in which no tuple overlaps. After this, the operators can be applied more efficiently.

Check it out
